name: MEC Fresh Tracks Snowboard Tote
description:
Protect your board (and protect other things from your board) with this lightweight, durable tote. Long enough for boards up to 165 cm, with extra volume for clothing and associated gear, it's an ideal solution for travel to the trailhead and off-season storage.Durable polyester fabric is coated with polyurethane to protect against moisture and abrasions.Fits boards up to 165 cm.Extra volume allows you to pack protective materials around snowshoes.Oversized plastic zipper pull loops for easy opening and closing with gloved hands.Reflective logo detail.

        Sustainability
